item.title: Document Management on a Synology NAS
item.description: Introduction Have you ever looked on your desk and thought ‘Oh, well… I should have a better way to organize those paperworks’? I’ve been reading some articles over digitalizing all my paperworks throughout the past years, but always hesitated because I had no idea of a good architecture for home and laziness of course. I wanted to have an accessible solution centralized at home to store my documents and being able to search all the stuff that I may need someday.
